snippet: The justices, with Antonin Scalia and Clarence Thomas dissenting, lifted a temporary stay that had been issued on Monday.
abstract: Supreme Court allows same-sex marriages to proceed in Kansas, lifting temporary stay issued by Justice Sonia Sotomayor.
lead_paragraph: The justices, with Antonin Scalia and Clarence Thomas dissenting, lifted a temporary stay that had been issued on Monday.

headline.main: Supreme Court Lets Gay Marriages Proceed in Kansas
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Lets Marriages Go On in Kansas

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
